name: Regrowth: A Game by Tired Studios
name_original: Regrowth: A Game by Tired Studios
description:
Welcome to Regrowth! You are a member of a village that has recently been displaced by rising water levels. It is your goal to help the other villagers with their problems, and restore some semblance of normality to their lives after this great tragedy. 

Solve puzzles, talk to villagers, complete mini-games! Discover what has caused this community to be plagued with these issues. Can you help them, or is it too late?

Tired Studio Devs:

Jiaqi Wang: 3D Models/Animation

Nahee Jaime Choi: Environmental/System Design

Jonathan Singh: Primary Programmer
